item.title: A GPT-3 bot to answer my tickets
item.author: contact@enconn.fr (Sébastien Blin)
item.description: Long time no see! I have a looooooot of projects in mind and a lot far too big (+40h of work & personal community stuff & life). However, I got a list of projects I can do in one week-end(ish) (e.g. a Gartic Phone with DALL-E, play with open push, etc) and because I answer to a lot of tickets every-day, I was wondering how this can be automatized nowadays with all the new AI projects (for the fun, to be honest, I think a good FAQ should answer to all common questions and a good documentation should complete this.
